chinese: 这些差别大概是遗传上的差别。

english: Under the genetic plan, organs develop .
chinese: 器官的发育依据遗传图式而进行。

english: I have as much of my father in me as you .
chinese: 我秉受父亲的遗传和你一样多。

english: The polygene is one member of a system .
chinese: 多基因是一个遗传体系的成员之一。

english: Most chromomeres contain a genetic unit .
chinese: 绝大多数染色粒包含一个遗传单位。
遗传造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Some diseases are present by heredity .
It can change to a large or small genotroph .
chinese: 它可能转变成大的或小的营养遗传规范。

english: Sexual reproduction can bring about genetic commingling .
chinese: 有性繁殖可取得杂交遗传。

english: Mitochondria do not use the universal genetic code .
chinese: 线粒体并不使用通用的遗传密码。

english: I inherited a hardy constitution from sturdy forbears .
chinese: 我自祖先那儿遗传到强壮的体格。

english: Heredity also plays a role in some types of mental illness .
chinese: 遗传在某些精神病中也有作用。

english: There are probably over a million different idiotypes in the body .
chinese: 全身约有一百万种遗传型。

english: Only the additive genetic variance is transmissible by seed .
chinese: 仅仅加性遗传方差是由种子遗传的。

english: Parents transmit some of their characteristics to their children .
chinese: 父母把一些特殊气质遗传给儿女。

english: The heritability of most phenological characters is considerable .
chinese: 大部分物候特征的遗传力都相当强。
